Sentencas: A hybrid power system consists of a combination of two or more power generation technologies to make best use of their operating characteristics and to obtain efficiencies higher than that could be obtained from a single power source.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: Since fuel cells directly convert fuel and an oxidant into electricity through an electrochemical process, they produce very low emissions and have higher operating efficiencies.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: Hence, combining fuel cells with other sources, the efficiency of the combined system can be further increased or extend the duration of the available power to the load as a backup power.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: In this paper, different types of fuel-cell hybrid systems and their applications are presented.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: An analysis of the combined cycle operation of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-microturbine is presented.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: A strategy for combining the thermophotovoltaic power generation unit and SOFC to obtain the hybrid power system that would have higher efficiency is proposed.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation

Sentencas: The hybrid operation of wind power and solar power system with proton exchange membrane fuel cell is also presented.
Titulo: Hybrid fuel-cell strategies for clean power generation
